document.full_text: china said on tuesday everything was "normal" at a tibetan buddhist monastery after the dalai lama urged restraint in a stand-off between security forces and tibetans at the temple in southwest china.
document.title: china says everything "normal" at restive tibetan temple
lines_and_colors: china said on tuesday everything was "normal" at a tibetan buddhist monastery after the dalai lama urged restraint in a stand-off between security forces and tibetans at the temple in southwest china.
